title: How to put an iTunes playlist on an SD card - Quora

response.answer_text: Insert the SD card into your computer, and then double-click its icon so it looks like an open folder. Highlight tracks you want in iTunes, and drag to the SD card. This places a copy of each file onto the SD card, and does change anything in your library. If you are Apple Music subscription users, you can Transfer Apple Music to USB Drive.
